categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars Rebels

nodes.text: Cob Tier was a human friend of the Bridger family who introduced Ezra Bridger to the Rodian Tseebo.

Cob Tier appeared in the original outline of "Empire Day," the sixth episode of the canon animated series Star Wars Rebels' first season, which was first released on demand on November 10, 2014 and made its broadcast debut the following week on Disney XD on November 17, 2014, but the character was eventually combined with Tseebo as the story evolved.
